attributes.additional_details: For example, in the south, say after 9pm there are hardly any cars on the road, so why stop at pointless traffic lights.
attributes.background: Switch traffic lights to flash amber as they do in places like Italy, so you don't have to stop and go. More pollution and dust is made by stopping/starting.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to change how traffic lights operate, but we're not sure exactly what changes you would like the Government to make.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, changing the rules for traffic lights so road users are not required to stop at amber lights.
